loginDialogs.userNotFoundTip: It seems you misspelled your username, please re-enter it to try again
loginDialogs.invalidPasswordTip: It seems you misspelled your password, re-enter it to try again

appManagement.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this application? This operation is irreversible and you will lose all its linked design and data.
appManagement.firstUrl: Url for notification of points obtaining events.
appManagement.secondUrl: Url to send notification for completion of challenges.
appManagement.thirdUrl: Url to send notifications of badge acquisition events.
appManagement.fourthUrl: Url to send notifications of level up events.
appManagement.firstUrlTip: A POST request will be sent to this URL notifying the events of the type 'player gets points'.
appManagement.secondUrlTip: A POST request will be sent to this URL notifying the events of the type 'player completed a challenge'.
appManagement.thirdUrlTip: A POST request will be sent to this URL notifying the events of the type 'player acquires badge'.
appManagement.fourthUrlTip: A POST request will be sent to this URL notifying the events of the type 'player level up'.

action.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this action? This operation is irreversible.

level.pointRequiredWarning: You must select a point type to measure level progress.
level.pointThresholdWarning: You must specify the number of points required to reach this level.
level.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this level? This operation is irreversible.

point.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this point? This operation is irreversible.
point.initialPointsTip: Number of points that all players start with.
point.dailyMaxTip: Maximum amount of this point that the player can get in one day. Write -1 if there is no maximum.
point.hiddenTip: Select false if you want this point not to be shown to the player in their profile or to be notified when they acquire it.
point.defaultTip: Select true if the point is essential to the design.
point.maxPointsTip: Maximum amount of this point that a player can get. Write -1 if there is no maximum.

challenge.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this challenge? This operation is irreversible and may affect other data.

leaderboard.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this leaderboard? This operation is irreversible.

badge.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this badge? This operation is irreversible and may affect other data.
